facts.content: Destiny is a gift. Some go their entire lives, living existences of quiet desperation, never learning the truth that what feels as though a burden pushing down upon our shoulders is actually a sense of purpose lifting us to greater heights. Never forget that fear is but the precursor of valor, that to strive and triumph in the face of fear is what it means to be a hero. Don't think. Become.
facts.author: Blinky

facts.content: A life of almost is a life of never.
facts.author: Blinky

facts.content: Fear heightens your senses. Fear keeps you alive. Arrogance gets you killed.
facts.author: Blinky

facts.content: Even the word 'hopeless' isn't devoid of hope.
facts.author: Blinky

facts.content: You cannot quit, you cannot give up. You need that momentum to break free. When a rocket is flying out towards the moon to escape the atmosphere, it doesn't f--king pause halfway up the sky, does it? No, it keeps going
facts.author: Andrew Tate

facts.content: If someone tried to take control of your body and make you a slave, you would fight for freedom. Yet how easily you hand over your mind to anyone who insults you. When you dwell on their words and let them dominate your thoughts, you make them your master.
facts.author: Epictetus

facts.content: If your path demands you to walk through hell, walk as if you own the damn place.
facts.author: Unknown

facts.content: How lucky am I to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
facts.author: Winnie the Pooh

facts.content: Glory is fleeting but obscurity is forever
facts.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

facts.content: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
facts.author: Rumi

facts.content: Envy is a declaration of inferiority
facts.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

facts.content: Those who do not move, do not notice their chains.
facts.author: Rosa Luxemburg

facts.content: People generally see what they look for, and hear what they listen for
facts.author: To Kill a Mockingbird

facts.content: If you are working on something that you really care about, you donâ€™t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
facts.author: Steve Jobs
